review: We got this for free by prepaying for Sling TV for three months. We love the Fire Stick and Sling TV so much we dumped Dish Network, got an Indoor Antenna for local channels that ends up saving us $80 a month!  I highly recommend this option to anyone looking to save money without sacrificing your favorite cable channels.
